data.name: CannotBeEmpty
data.value: Field '{0}' cannot be empty

data.value: Field '{0}' must be valid url

data.value: Field '{0}' cannot be empty if field '{1}' is provided

data.value: Field '{0}' is required

data.name: Invalid
data.value: Field '{0}' is invalid

data.name: LogoMustMatchUrl
data.value: The link does not match the selected social network

data.name: ValidUrl_UrlDisplayed
data.value: Field '{0}' ({1}) must be valid url

data.name: GreaterThan
data.value: '{0}' must be greater than {1}

data.name: MaxLength
data.value: Maximum length of field '{0}' is {1}

data.name: MustBeOneOf
data.value: Field '{0}' accepts only following values: {1}

data.name: LengthMustBeInRange
data.value: The length of the field '{0}' must be from {1} to {2}

data.name: EmailAddressFormat
data.value: The email address must be in the correct format

data.name: TransliterationUrlFormat
data.value: Transliteration url must consists of small latin characters, numbers and hyphen

data.name: MustBeBetween
data.value: Field '{0}' must be between {1} and {2}

data.name: MustBeUnique
data.value: Field '{0}' must be unique

data.name: ImageDoesntExist
data.value: Image with id {0} doesnt exist

data.name: InvalidNewsUrl
data.value: Field 'Url' accepts only small latin alphabet letters, hyphen and numbers.

data.name: InvalidPrecision
data.value: Field '{0}' has invalid precision

data.name: DateStringFormat
data.value: Field 'Date String' accepts only cyrillic letters, numbers, dashes (–) and parentheses.

data.name: MustContainExactlyOneAlt1
data.value: Field '{0}' must contain exactly one black and white image.

data.name: MustContainAtMostOneAlt0
data.value: Field '{0}' may contain at most one colored image.

data.name: MustContainAtMostOneAlt2
data.value: Field '{0}' may contain at most one image for links.

data.name: EventStreetcodeCannotHasFirstName
data.value: The streetcode of type 'Event' cannot has 'First name' and 'Last name'

data.name: MinLength
data.value: Максимальна length of field '{0}' is {1}

data.name: MustContainAtMostThreeExpertises
data.value: Field '{0}' may contain at most three expertises

data.name: NameFormat
data.value: Name must consist of Cyrillic or Latin characters (both uppercase and lowercase) and can only include hyphens (-) and apostrophes (').

data.name: SurnameFormat
data.value: Surname must consist of Cyrillic or Latin characters (both uppercase and lowercase) and can only include hyphens (-) and apostrophes (').

data.name: UserNameFormat
data.value: Username must consist of Latin characters (lowercase) and can only include hyphens (-), apostrophes (') and underscores(_).

data.name: ImageSizeExceeded
data.value: The image size can't exceed {0} MB

data.name: InvalidPaginationParameters
data.value: Pagination parameters must be valid

data.name: MustNotBeInPast
data.value: {0} must not be in the past.

data.name: PhoneFormat
data.value: Invalid phone number format: +XXXXXXXXXXXX

data.name: PasswordNoWhitespace
data.value: Password cannot contain whitespaces

data.name: PasswordMustContainDigit
data.value: Password must contain at least one digit

data.name: PasswordMustContainSpecial
data.value: Password must contain at least one non-alphanumeric symbol

data.name: PasswordNoPercent
data.value: Password cannot contain '%'

data.name: PasswordMustContainUpper
data.value: Password must contain at least one UPPERCASE letter

data.name: PasswordMustContainLower
data.value: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter

data.name: PasswordConfirmationNotEqual
data.value: Password and confirmation password must be the same

data.name: MaxCountExceeded
data.value: Field '{0}' must not exceed {1} items.
